claim_ens_page.title: Claim a unique Name
claim_ens_page.subtitle: Unique names can be assigned to your avatar for use as an alias, or they can be assigned to parcels.{br} Assigning a name to a parcel or estate allows you to create a unique URL, like {exampleLink}, making it easy to send people to your LAND. When someone follows your new URL, they will be redirected to your LAND in {dclWorldLink}{br} Names are only available in Ethereum, and can only be claimed with Ethereum MANA {symbol}

deploy_to_world_announcement_modal.title:
You can now publish

your scenes to Worlds
deploy_to_world_announcement_modal.description: Create your scene with the Builder and publish it to a World in a few clicks.

templates_announcement_modal.title: Expand your creativity with templates and the community scene pool
templates_announcement_modal.description: From now on you can start downloading and using templates and scenes from the community pool. Let your imagination shape your Worlds and LANDs!

smart_wearables_announcement_modal.title: Smart Wearables are now live! 🟢
smart_wearables_announcement_modal.description:
Take Wearables to the next level with Portable Experiences

Monetize your Portable Experiences through Smart Wearables and expand the usability of Wearables by offering players new abilities (like flying!) or an extra layer of content overlaid on Decentraland scenes.

emotes_v2_announcement_modal.title: Emotes 2.0 are Live! 🟢
emotes_v2_announcement_modal.description:
Emotes now offer more than movement!

Take advantage of these extended capabilities and enhance your Emotes with with props and sounds for a more expressive experience.

use_as_alias_modal.title: Use as Alias
use_as_alias_modal.subtitle: This will be your name in the Metaverse
use_as_alias_modal.body: Use {newName} as your avatar’s new alias. Unique names are a great way to help your friends find you in the Metaverse! This will replace {oldName}.
use_as_alias_modal.success: {name} is your new alias in the Metaverse! Let other people see your new name when visiting the world.
use_as_alias_modal.error: Something went wrong... Please try again later.

submit.title: Creator Contest

dissolve_modal.title: Dissolve Estate
dissolve_modal.confirm: You are about to dissolve {name}. Do you want to proceed?
dissolve_modal.too_big: This Estate is too big to be dissolved in one transaction. Please remove parcels until its size is at most {max} parcels.

edit_project_modal.title: Scene details
edit_project_modal.unpublish_needed: Please Unpublish your Scene before updating your Scene Details

ens_list_page.title: Your NAMEs
ens_list_page.empty_names: It looks like you don't have any Names.{br} {link} to get started.
ens_list_page.alias_popup: This name is being used by your profile but it can still be assigned
ens_list_page.not_profile_created: You need to get into the world first to set an alias.

empty_state.title: Nothing Here Yet
empty_state.subtitle: Own your presence in the metaverse with a username free from numbers on the end (e.g. Genesis#1234), plus enjoy the added benefits of Voting Power and access to your own World!

tooltips.alias: You can only assign one NAME per avatar
tooltips.address: Use your Decentraland NAME across Web3 thanks to a partnership with ENS.
tooltips.land: When you assign a LAND parcel or estate a NAME it can be easily navigated to with a dedicated URL (e.g. https://name.dcl.eth).

ens_map_address_modal.title: Assigned Address
ens_map_address_modal.description: Enable others to reference your account by assigning an Ethereum address to your Decentraland NAME. This allows you to receive assets simply by providing your NAME.
ens_map_address_modal.error_title: An error occur while setting the address

set_resolver.title: Grant Permission
set_resolver.info:
Enable others to reference your account by defining an Ethereum address with your Decentraland NAME.



This allows you to receive assets simply by providing your NAME. Authorize the public ENS resolver to set the address record on your behalf in Decentraland.
set_resolver.error: Something went wrong, please try again.

ens_reclaim_name_modal.title: Reclaim name
ens_reclaim_name_modal.info:
Claim ownership of the ETH domain associated with this NAME to be registered as its owner by the public ENS resolver.



This will allow you to link a LAND parcel to your NAME or assign it a wallet address so you can recieve assets across Web3 by simply providing your NAME.
ens_reclaim_name_modal.error: Something went wrong, please try again.

table.name: NAME
table.empty_url: To activate this world you need to publish a scene
table.scene_published_outside_builder: The scene project may have been deleted or published using the SDK.

empty_list.title: Get a free World when you own a NAME
empty_list.description: Each NAME grants you access to one World, your own 3D space in the metaverse where you can shape the space however you like and invite up to 100 people to visit.
empty_list.title_ens: Get a free World when you own a ENS Domain
empty_list.description_ens: With an ENS Domain, you can create a unique World with 25 Mb of dedicated storage. It's a great way to start your journey in Decentraland.

worlds_storage.description: Total storage is calculated based on MANA, LAND, and NAME holdings.

worlds_warning_message.to_be_blocked: You are using more storage than you are allowed. Unpublish some scenes to free some space or increase you maximum storage before {toBeBlockedAt} to avoid losing access to your scenes.
worlds_warning_message.blocked: Access to your scenes has been blocked since {blockedAt} because you don't have enough storage to maintain your currently published Worlds. Unpublish some scenes to free some space or increase your maximum storage to regain access.

error_page.subtitle: There was an error, this is all we know:
error_page.title: Oops!

collections.card_description: Create, review and publish your collections of Wearables and Emotes.

scenes.card_description: Build your space in your LAND. You can use free 3D models or upload your own.

land.card_description: Publish Scenes, create Estates and manage permissions of your LAND.

names.card_description: Claim your unique name and assign it to your avatar or your parcels.

scenes_page.no_projects: You can publish your scenes in your LAND, your Worlds or upload them to the Scene Pool.{br}Alternatively, you can also <link>upload a scene file</link> and continue working from here.
scenes_page.no_projects_guest: Your Scenes have been uploaded to the Cloud{br}{sign_in} to view them.
scenes_page.sdk6_support: Technical support for SDK 6 will end on December 23rd, 2023.
scenes_page.choose_scene_creation: Choose the best option to build your scene

no_scenes.title: Create your first scene
no_scenes.description: Unleash your creativity. Start building scenes for your LANDs and Worlds and share with the community. Learn more about creating Scenes.

from_scratch.title: Start from scratch
from_scratch.description: Start building your scenes from the ground up with the online builder in a simple and intuitive way.

from_template.title: Use predefined templates
from_template.description: Choose one of these polished templates and release an amazing scene with just a few clicks!

scenes_page.subtitle: With easy-to-use tools and hundreds of 3D items to choose from, the Builder makes world building fun. Let your creativity loose.

mobile_page.desktop_too_narrow: The Builder doesn't work on this resolution! Try making this window wider if you can.
mobile_page.gallery_title: Check out work from Builder users!

mobile_page.reminder_body:
Hey there!

Whoops! It looks like you tried to use the Builder from a mobile device!
The Builder only runs on desktop and laptop computers. Grab your nearest computer, and try again at https://builder.decentraland.org

Happy building!

The Decentraland Team

secondary_hero.title: Want to build something when you get to your computer?

mobile_page.success: Thanks, we will keep you posted!

mobile_page.fourth_paragraph: Claim your {bold_text} and assign it to your avatar or parcels.

land_assign_ens_page.set_name_message: Before you can assign this name to your land, you need to submit 1 or 2 transactions: The first transaction allows you to use your name as a link and the second transaction links your name to your LAND.
land_assign_ens_page.set_resolver_explanation: This allows your name to be linked to a land.
land_assign_ens_page.set_content_explanation: This resolves your name with a link to your land in Decentraland.

land_select_ens_page.name_assigned: This name has been assigned to this land

migrate_page.step_one_message_line_one: In order to provide a seamless experience across our products, we have switched the Builder's account system from email to wallet based. This means that you will need to connect an Ethereum wallet to store your scenes in the Cloud. If you don't have a wallet you can learn more about how to get one {link}.
migrate_page.step_one_message_line_two: If you had Scenes stored in your email account, you can migrate them to your wallet account using this page.
migrate_page.step_two_message: Please login with your email account to find the Scenes that need to be migrated.
migrate_page.step_three_message: Please connect your wallet to continue. If you don't have a wallet here's a {link} to get one.
migrate_page.step_three_error: Please install {metamask} or other Ethereum wallet to continue
migrate_page.step_four_message: Migrate all Scenes and asset packs under your email account into your wallet account.
migrate_page.projects_title: The following Scenes will be migrated:

operator_page.title: Set Operator
operator_page.subtitle:
You are setting an operator for {name}.

Operators can only deploy scenes to the LAND.

project_card.confirm_delete_content: Are you sure you want to delete your Scene "{title}"? This operation is not reversible

create_modal.title: Create a Scene

create_modal.sdk_title: Experience the new Decentraland Web Editor
create_modal.sdk_subtitle: Harness the power of SDK 7 without any code.
create_modal.sdk_description: Enhance your scene-building process with our improved visual editor. All features from the previous Scene Builder are included, while the addition of Smart Items is scheduled for an upcoming update.

clone_template_modal.title: Set a name and a description for your scene
clone_template_modal.name_max_length: The name can be 32 characters at most

clear_history_modal.title: Are you sure?
clear_history_modal.text: You are about to clear your transaction history. Do you want to proceed?

settings_page.disclaimer: You can assign other addresses to operate all your parcels or estates on your behalf. They {emphasis} be able to transfer or sell them, they will just be allowed to publish content on them.
settings_page.authorization: You authorized {address} to operate all your {type} on your behalf.
settings_page.authorization_action: Authorize {address} to operate all your {type} on your behalf.

transaction.approve_token: You {action} the {contract} contract to operate {token} on your behalf.
transaction.change_profile: Your name is used as alias for {address}
transaction.edit_estate_add: You added {count} {count, plural, one {parcel} other {parcels}} to {name}.
transaction.edit_estate_remove: You removed {count} {count, plural, one {parcel} other {parcels}} from {name}.
transaction.set_manager_assigned: You assigned {address} as operator of all your {type}.
transaction.set_manager_revoked: You revoked {address} as operator of all your {type}.
transaction.set_price_and_beneficiary: You edited the price and/or beneficiary of {name}
transaction.collection_item_minted: Minted {itemName} for the collection {collectionName} {count, plural, one {once} other {{count} times}}
transaction.unset_collection_on_sale: Removed the collection {name} from being on sale
transaction.set_ens_content: Set redirection content for the name "{name}" on {land_link}.
transaction.unset_ens_content: Removed redirection content for the name "{name}".
transaction.allowed_claim_mana: Allowed MANA to claim a new name
transaction.disallowed_claim_mana: Disallowed MANA to claim a new name
transaction.rescue_items: Approved content of {count} {count, plural, one {item} other {items}} for {collectionName}

transfer_page.title: Transfer
transfer_page.subtitle: Your are about to transfer {name}.
transfer_page.disclaimer: Remember that transferring is an irreversible operation.{br}Please check the address carefully.

toasts.localstorage: Scenes are stored in your browser. {sign_in} to save them in the Cloud!

topbar.bounds_exceeded: Item out of bounds{br}Move the item inside the boundaries!
topbar.up_to_date: Up to date!{br}All the changes are published

slide0.description: This is Decentraland’s new Scene builder. Before you get started, let us show you around.
slide0.title: Welcome to the Builder!

slide1.description: To move an object, click and drag the object.
slide1.title: Moving objects

slide2.description: Add objects to your Scene from the sidebar on the right.
slide2.title: Adding objects

slide3.description: Rotate objects by clicking on the Rotate tool and dragging the orbits.
slide3.title: Arrows and orbits

slide4.description: Drag with the left button to rotate the camera. Use the right button to pan.
slide4.title: Controlling the camera

tutorial_modal.subtitle: The Builder is super easy to use, here are some tips before you begin
tutorial_modal.title: Get started with the Builder

unsupported_browser_page.subtitle: The Builder does not support your browser.{br}Please visit this page using {chrome} or {firefox}
unsupported_browser_page.title: Oops!

description.length: Description length must be between {min} and {max} characters.

title.length: Title length must be between {min} and {max} characters.

wallet.title: Connect your wallet to sign in.

collections_page.empty_description: You have no collections yet. Create a new collection, and dress the metaverse in style!

curation_page.search_placeholder: Search by name or owner address
curation_page.empty_collections: There are no collections to review yet.

self_assign.title: Confirm your assignation to {collection_name}
self_assign.body: You will be the responsible of {emphasis}. If needed, you will be able to reassign the collection to another curator.
self_assign.emphasis: reviewing this collection and communicating with the creator in the forum
self_assign.success: The {collection_name} collection have been assigned to you.

reassign.title: Edit assigned curator for {collection_name} collection
reassign.body: In case you cannot review this collection, reassign it to another curator. Make sure you let them know about this change.
reassign.success: The {collection_name} collection have been assigned to {assignee}.

curation_page.error_message_body: Something went wrong... Please try again later.

confirm_not_assigned_curation_modal.title: Approve collection
confirm_not_assigned_curation_modal.body: This collection is assigned to {assignee}. If needed, you can still approve it but make sure to let the assigned curator know about it.
confirm_not_assigned_curation_modal.confirm_footer: Confirm the approval of this collection so it is enabled to be minted.
confirm_not_assigned_curation_modal.confirm_button: Assign to me and approve collection

item_detail_page.notice: You need to add your items to a collection before you can publish them
item_detail_page.delete_published_item: You can't delete a published item

third_party_collection_detail_page.notice: Each published item takes 1 Slot. Create a draft-proposal in the DAO to ask for more slots
third_party_collection_detail_page.selection: {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} selected.
third_party_collection_detail_page.max_select_count: You can publish up to {count} items at a time
third_party_collection_detail_page.slots: {amount, plural, =0 {No Slots} one {# Slot} other {# Slots}}
third_party_collection_detail_page.start_adding_items: Looking good! Start adding items to your new collection
third_party_collection_detail_page.cant_remove: You will not be able to add or remove items after publishing them.
third_party_collection_detail_page.publish_items: Publish {count, plural, =0 {} one {# item} other {# items}}
third_party_collection_detail_page.cant_publish: This collection is still under review, once that process ends you'll be able to publish more items
third_party_collection_detail_page.cant_publish_items: You're trying to publish {count} {count, plural, one {item} other {items}}. There are others under review right now
third_party_collection_detail_page.exceeds_available_slots: You're exceeding the amount of available slots. Create a proposal in the DAO to add more slots
third_party_collection_detail_page.cant_publish_and_push_changes: You're trying to publish {count} {count, plural, one {item} other {items}} and push changes at the same time. Unselect the items to publish to able to push changes

collection_detail_page.set_on_sale_popup: This will allow your collection to be sold in the Decentraland Marketplace.
collection_detail_page.unset_on_sale_popup: This collection is on sale in the Decentraland Marketplace.
collection_detail_page.notice: Cool! Now you can start working on your items. {editor_link} to open the editor or click the edit button on any item.
collection_detail_page.add_items_subtitle: Now you can start adding items to your collection
collection_detail_page.add_items_subtitle_extensions: Accepted files are ZIP, GLTF, GLB, PNG.
collection_detail_page.start_adding_items: Looking good! Start adding items to your new collection
collection_detail_page.cant_remove: You will not be able to add or remove items after publishing your collection.
collection_detail_page.can_mint: Minting allows you to transfer NFTs directly to an address.
collection_detail_page.cant_mint: This collection is still under review, once that process ends you'll be able to mint items
collection_detail_page.cant_push: This collection is still under review, items can still be minted but will not reflect new changes until approval
collection_detail_page.cant_operate: This collection is still locked, once publication ends you'll be able to operate again
collection_detail_page.publish_reason_max_items: A collection can be published with a max amount of {maxItems} items.
collection_detail_page.publish_reason_no_items: You need to add at least one item to publish your collection.
collection_detail_page.publish_reason_items_not_complete: All items must be complete to publish your collection, check if all the properties are set.
collection_detail_page.missing_item_price: You need to configure the price of one or more {item_type}.
collection_detail_page.missing_smart_wearable_video: You need to upload a video for one or more smart wearables.
collection_detail_page.unsynced_collection_title: There are unsynced items in this collection
collection_detail_page.unsynced_collection_message: One or more items have been modified after this collection was approved.{br}These updates need to be published and reviewed again by the curation commitee.
collection_detail_page.under_review_collection_message: Updated items are being reviewed by the curation committee. Once they are approved,{br}they will be automatically visible to the current owners and in the Marketplace.

collection_context_menu.unpublished: This collection is not published yet
collection_context_menu.not_posted: The collection wasn't posted to the forum. You can retry here
collection_context_menu.delete_published_collection: You can't delete a published collection
collection_context_menu.change_published_urn: You can't change the URN once the collection is published

collection_item.cannot_edit_urn: You can't edit the URN once the item is published

edit_price_and_beneficiary_modal.title: Set Price
edit_price_and_beneficiary_modal.price_message: Keep in mind that the minimun amount supported for costless transactions is {minPrice}.{br}{br}If your item costs less than that, the buyer will need to cover the transaction cost in {token}.
edit_price_and_beneficiary_modal.beneficiary_popup: This is the wallet address that will receive MANA when the item is sold for the first time and Royalties when it is resold. You can set a different beneficiary address for each item in a collection.
edit_price_and_beneficiary_modal.free_message: The original Creator will be the Beneficiary for the generated Royalties

confirm_delete.subcontent: Are you sure you want to delete the item "{name}"? This operation is not reversible.

delete_item_modal.title: Delete {name}
delete_item_modal.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?{br}This operation is not reversible.

publish_collection_modal.title: Publish Collection
publish_collection_modal.first_paragraph: You are about to publish your collection, keep in mind the following things:
publish_collection_modal.second_paragraph: You will not be able to add or delete items after you publish your collection.
publish_collection_modal.third_paragraph: You won’t be able to change the name of the collection. Please ensure it’s spelled correctly and doesn’t violate intellectual property rights.
publish_collection_modal.fourth_paragraph: You will be able to see your items in the marketplace but they will be available for sale once the collection is validated by the DAO.
publish_collection_modal.items_breakdown_title: You are about to publish {count} {count, plural, one {item} other {items}}. The MANA fee for each collection goes to the Decentraland DAO, where it is used to support the growth of the community through grants, events, and prizes.
publish_collection_modal.tos_title: I hereby represent and warrant that:
publish_collection_modal.tos_first_condition: 1: The submitted Wearable/s is in full compliance with the {terms_of_use} and {content_policy}, which I acknowledge and accept.
publish_collection_modal.tos_second_condition: 2: I have sufficient Intellectual Property Rights over the submitted Wearable/s.
publish_collection_modal.tos_third_condition: 3: I acknowledge that the DAO may refuse to mint the Wearable/s based on infringements to the Content Policy and Terms of Use. I also acknowledge that the proposal fee won’t be reimbursed in case of rejection.
publish_collection_modal.invalid_email: The given email is not valid.
publish_collection_modal.accept_by_publishing: By clicking Publish you are accepting our terms
publish_collection_modal.not_enough_mana: You don't have enough {symbol} to publish this collection.
publish_collection_modal.get_mana: You can get more using the {link} dapp.
publish_collection_modal.unsynced_collection: The collection you are trying to publish is different from the one we have in our servers. Please, refresh the browser and try again.

publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.title: Publish Collection
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.first_paragraph: You are about to publish your collection, keep in mind the following things:
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.second_paragraph: You will not be able to add or delete items after you publish your collection.
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.third_paragraph: You won’t be able to change the name of the collection. Please ensure it’s spelled correctly and doesn’t violate intellectual property rights.
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.fourth_paragraph: You will be able to see your items in the marketplace but they will be available for sale once the collection is validated by the DAO.
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.items_breakdown_title: You are about to publish a collection with {count} {count, plural, one {item} other {items}}. In order to support the growth of the community, there is a publication fee of {publicationFee} {currency} per item (paid in MANA) that goes to the DAO and the Curation Committee.
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.learn_more: Learn more about the Publication Fee
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.estimate_notice: * Total in MANA is calculated based on the current market prices. This value can slightly change when the transaction is executed.
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.rarities_error: There was an error while trying to fetch the publication fees.
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.tos_title: I hereby represent and warrant that:
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.tos_first_condition: 1: The submitted Wearable/s is in full compliance with the {terms_of_use} and {content_policy}, which I acknowledge and accept.
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.tos_second_condition: 2: I have sufficient Intellectual Property Rights over the submitted Wearable/s.
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.tos_third_condition: 3: I acknowledge that the DAO may refuse to mint the Wearable/s based on infringements to the Content Policy and Terms of Use. I also acknowledge that the proposal fee won’t be reimbursed in case of rejection.
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.invalid_email: The given email is not valid.
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.accept_by_publishing: By clicking Publish you are accepting our terms
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.not_enough_mana: You don't have enough {symbol} to publish this collection.
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.get_mana: You can get more using the {link} or you can pay by Card.
publish_collection_modal_with_oracle.unsynced_collection: The collection you are trying to publish is different from the one we have in our servers. Please, refresh the browser and try again.

confirm_collection_name_step.title: Confirm collection name
confirm_collection_name_step.subtitle: The name of the collection can't be modified after sending it for review.
confirm_collection_name_step.description: Make sure it doesn't have any typos, and it doesn't contain any Intellectual Property you don't own (E.g: Star Wars, Sailor Moon, etc)

confirm_collection_items_step.title: Confirm items
confirm_collection_items_step.subtitle: Items cannot be added or deleted from a collection once it is published.{br}The rarity of items cannot be changed after publication either.
confirm_collection_items_step.description: Item name, description and categories can be modified.

review_content_policy_step.title: Before sending your collection for review
review_content_policy_step.subtitle: Please confirm your acknowledgment.
review_content_policy_step.content_policy_first_condition: I understand I wont be able to modify the name of the collection and I can attest that "{collection_name}" as a name doesn't violate any Intellectual Property rights.
review_content_policy_step.accept_terms_of_use: I warrant that the submitted item(s) are in full compliance with the {terms_of_use_link} and {content_policy_link}, which I acknowledge and accept.
review_content_policy_step.acknowledge_immutability: I understand I won't be able to add or delete items after the collection is published.
review_content_policy_step.acknowledge_dao_terms: I acknowledge that the DAO may refuse to approve the item(s) based on infringements to the {content_policy_link} and {terms_of_use_link}. I also acknowledge that the proposal fee won't be reimbursed in case of rejection since its purpose is to compensate curators for their time and work.
review_content_policy_step.email_disclousure: We need your email for future communications about this collection.
review_content_policy_step.email_disclousure_detail: We will only use this email for communications about this collection in particular.{enter}It won't be linked to your account.
review_content_policy_step.email_newsletter: Keep me in the loop! Use this email for Decentraland's weekly newsletter, updates, and contest news.

pay_publication_fee_step.title: Confirm items
pay_publication_fee_step.subtitle: You are about to send for review the collection "{collection_name}" that includes {count} items. In order to support the Curators Committee and the DAO treasure, there is a publication fee of {currency} {publication_fee} per item (paid in MANA).
pay_publication_fee_step.pay_card_info: A 5% transaction fee will be added to your total by the payment processor, as well as an additional 0.5% to cover possible currency fluctuations.

congratulations_step.title: Your collection is now available for curators to review
congratulations_step.subtitle: Any feedback will be sent in the {forum_post} where you and anyone in the community will be able to comment.
congratulations_step.description: The collection will be published after it is approved by the Curation Committee. Since this is a manual process, it can take a few days. Your patience is appreciated.

authorization.confirm_transaction_title: Complete transaction to publish your collection
authorization.authorize_mana_description: Keep in mind that some wallets require setting a custom MANA spending limit. Enter a fee price of {price} or a slightly higher amount to avoid transaction rejection due to price volatility. You can change the limit at any time.
authorization.set_cap_description: Enter a fee price of {price} or a slightly higher amount to avoid transaction rejection due to price volatility. You can change the limit at any time.
authorization.insufficient_amount_error_message: Remember to set a spending cap equal to the fee price {price} or higher to avoid being rejected due to price volatility. Revoke your current cap and try again.

publish_third_party_collection_modal.title: Publish Linked Items
publish_third_party_collection_modal.publish_description: About to use {slotsToUse, plural, one {# slot} other {# slots}} from {availableSlots} available slots to publish "{collectionName}".
publish_third_party_collection_modal.push_changes_description: About to push changes to {itemsWithChanges, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} for "{collectionName}".
publish_third_party_collection_modal.publish_and_push_changes_description: About to use {slotsToUse, plural, one {# slot} other {# slots}} from {availableSlots} available slots to publish "{collectionName}" and changes will be pushed to {itemsWithChanges, plural, one {# item} other {# items}}.

mint_items_modal.title: Mint Items
mint_items_modal.limit_reached: You can only mint {max} items per transaction
mint_items_modal.no_items: You have no items available to mint for "{name}"
mint_items_modal.unsynced_warning: Some items have changes that have not been approved yet.
mint_items_modal.confirm_title: You are about to mint {count} {count, plural, one {item} other {items}}, each item will be minted to the given address with the provided amount.

reset_item_modal.title: Reset Changes
reset_item_modal.content: The item is currently different from the one that has been previously approved by the committee. {br}The version you are seeing now does not correspond to the one visible in the marketplace and in the game. {br}You can push the changes for the committee to review this new version, or you can click on the confirm button to reset the item to it's original state.

put_for_sale.title: Do you want to put this collection for sale?
put_for_sale.description: The collection will be available for purchase in the Decentraland Marketplace.

remove_from_marketplace.title: Do you want to remove this collection from the Marketplace?
remove_from_marketplace.description: The collection will no longer be available for purchase in the Decentraland Marketplace.

sell_collection_modal.unsynced_warning: Some items have changes that have not been approved yet.

manager.title: Collaborators
manager.subtitle: If you collaborated with other creators when making this collection, enter their ETH address

minter.title: Minters
minter.subtitle: Enter the ETH address you want to allow for minting your items

push_collection_changes_modal.title: Push Changes
push_collection_changes_modal.description: Changes have been made to the collection or the items contained by it since the last time a curator has reviewed them.{br}In order to have this changes reflected on the marketplace and in the game, they have to be reviewed and approved again by the committee.{br}Are you sure you want to push the changes for review?

see_in_world_modal.title: See in Decentraland
see_in_world_modal.subtitle: Choose a location to try your items in Decentraland

empty_parcel.title: Empty Parcel
empty_parcel.subtitle: Just run and jump. It loads faster.

collection_card.confirm_delete_content: Are you sure you want to delete your collection "{name}"? This operation is not reversible

top_panel.items_pending_to_review: There are items pending to review
top_panel.not_enough_items_to_curate_more: The collection doesn't have more items to curate

rejection_modal.go_to_forum: Please go to related forum discussion and let the creator know your decision.
rejection_modal.visit_activity: You can check your {activity_link} to monitor the transaction

reject_curation.title: Reject Changes
reject_curation.subtitle: I guess the changes are not good enough, huh?

disable_collection.title: Disable Collection
disable_collection.subtitle: The collection will not be available anymore. Don't worry, you will be able to enable it again later.
disable_collection.tx_pending: Waiting for the disable collection transaction to confirm

left_panel.title: My Items

get_more_samples_modal.title: Get More Samples
get_more_samples_modal.content: This will replace the current samples and get {count} more randomly picked samples. You can always check previous samples in the {tabName} tab.

left_panel.invalid_representation_tooltip: This item doesn't have a {bodyShape} representation
left_panel.empty_collection: Empty collection, add some items first!

center_panel.disabled_animation_dropdown: There needs to be at least one visible item in order to select an avatar animation

right_panel.overrides_info: Overrides determine what other wearable categories and base body parts your item will hide. Just select them on the dropdown menu.
right_panel.replaces_info: When a user equips your item, any other items in the category you select will be unequipped. Users must reequip them after removing your item.
right_panel.hides_info: When a user equips your item, any other items in the category you select will stay equipped, but they won't be rendered. Users will only see their other items reappear after removing your item.
right_panel.base_body_info: The elements you choose from the base body dropdown menu will be hidden.
right_panel.wearables_info: The elements you choose from the wearables dropdown menu will be hidden.
right_panel.event_tag: Use the {event_tag} tag if you want to include this item in the {event_name} event.
right_panel.request_for_changes_explanation: If you want to make changes to {name} please ask a committee member for authorization in the forum

copyright.title: VRM Export Permission
copyright.info: Nice Wearable! Allow owners of your item to include it in VRM Avatar Exports so they can show it off outside of Decentraland.

video_showcase_modal.title: Detailed Video of your Smart Wearable

simple.description: Once triggered, the Emote will play once and return to the default pose.

loop.description: Once triggered, the Emote will play in loop until the player moves.

maintainance.notice: We're currently under maintainance, we'll be back soon!

meta_transaction_failure.title: Meta transaction
meta_transaction_failure.body: There was an error sending the meta transaction.{br}Please try again or join our {discord_link} to get support.

deploy_item_failure.title: Error on Item
deploy_item_failure.body: Fail to upload the item "{itemName}" from "{collectionName}".{br}The item size is too big for the max size of {size}

third_party_action_failure.title: Error
third_party_action_failure.body: Something went wrong... Please try again later.

move_item_to_another_collection.title: Item moved to another collection
move_item_to_another_collection.body: {item_name} has been moved to the {collection_name} collection.

collection.invalid_character: Invalid character! The ":" is not allowed in names

item.invalid_character: Invalid character! The ":" is not allowed in names or descriptions
item.cant_save_published: Item should not be published to save it
item.cant_save_without_collection: Can't save a published item without a collection

item_added_toast.title: Item added!
item_added_toast.body:
The item {name} was added to your collection.

View Collection

editor_preview.loading_unity_error: Please reload your browser. If the problem persist, try using a lighter scene or contact support.

rescue.title: Approve Items
rescue.subtitle: Please approve the items and their hashes

items_exceed_limit.title: Collection exceeds the maximum number of items
items_exceed_limit.content: Multiple transactions will be made. Be aware that you'll be asked to sign them.

upload.title: Upload Files
upload.subtitle: Please upload the content of the items

approve.title: Enable Collection
approve.subtitle: Please enable the collection to be minted

success.title: Collection Approved!
success.subtitle: Thank you for revieweing this collection

small.title: Get Your Items Featured During Decentraland Music Festival!
small.subtitle: Just Tag Your Festival-Themed Wearables & Emotes With {event_tag} And They'll Appear In A Special Marketplace Tab During The Event.

logged_in_detail_page.error_title: An error ocurred while loading the detail page

hands_category_ftu.title: Introducing Handwear
hands_category_ftu.subtitle: A new Wearable category for all your hand-enhancing creations
hands_category_ftu.description: Update your hand Wearables to the new category in the Editor once you’ve modified them accordingly. Please note, the Handwear category is for hand accessories or Wearables that replace hands with other functionally similar ones, not for items that are held.

migrate_to_sdk7_modal.save_a_copy: Save a copy of the original scene in SDK 6.

info.title: Upgrade Your Scene to SDK 7 with the New Decentraland Web Editor
info.subtitle: This scene is currently built with SDK 6, which will stop receiving support in a few months, but it can be automatically migrated to SDK 7. All features from the previous Scene Builder are included, while smart items will be added in an upcoming update.

info_smart_items.title: Upgrade Your Scene to SDK 7 with the New Decentraland Web Editor
info_smart_items.subtitle: This scene is currently built with SDK 6, which will stop receiving support in a few months, and contains smart items. If you choose to upgrade to SDK 7 using our improved visual editor, these smart items will be removed, as they are not yet supported.

migrate.title: Automatic Migration to SDK 7
migrate.subtitle:
This scene is currently built with SDK 6 but can be automatically migrated to SDK 7. This will enhance your scene-building experience with our new and improved Web Editor.



Ready to upgrade?

migrate_smart_items.title: Migration Options for Your Scene
migrate_smart_items.subtitle:
Your scene contains {smartItemsCount} Smart Items which are currently only supported in SDK 6.

You can choose to migrate to SDK 7 by removing these items, or continue using the legacy Scene Builder until Smart Items are available for SDK 7 (coming soon).

worlds_your_storage_modal.mana_earn_storage: Earn 100 Mb of storage per 2,000 tokens (Polygon or Ethereum).
worlds_your_storage_modal.mana_holdings: You have {mbs} Mb thanks to holding {owned} MANA tokens.
worlds_your_storage_modal.lands_earn_storage: Earn 100 Mb of storage per LAND.
worlds_your_storage_modal.lands_holdings: You have {mbs} Mb thanks to holding {owned} LANDs.
worlds_your_storage_modal.names_earn_storage: Earn 100 Mb of storage per NAME.
worlds_your_storage_modal.names_holdings: You have {mbs} Mb thanks to holding {owned} Decentraland NAMEs.
worlds_your_storage_modal.proposal: These storage rules were voted on and passed in a governance DAO proposal.

worlds_for_ens_owners_announcement_modal.title: Introducing Worlds for ENS Holders & Expanded World Size Limits
worlds_for_ens_owners_announcement_modal.description_ens: ENS domain holders will now automatically have access to their own Decentraland World with a scene size limit of 25 Mb.
worlds_for_ens_owners_announcement_modal.description_dcl: Meanwhile, Worlds from Decentraland NAMEs will have a dynamic maximum file size limit depending on a user's Decentraland holdings. Each NAME, LAND, and set of 2,000 MANA tokens owned will grant an additional 100 Mb of storage on the Worlds content server to be used as you wish.
